title: eth_getProof on pruned node crashes
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: v2.43.0

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash: 1106475

Erigon Command (with flags/config):
```
  --chain=mainnet \
  --datadir=/var/lib/erigon \
  --prune htcr \
  --http.api=eth,debug,net,web3
```
Concensus Layer: Lighthouse

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config): Mainnet

Chain/Network: Mainnet

#### Expected behaviour

Pruned node responds to `eth_getProof` for recent blocks

Test case in EIP-1186:
```sh
curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "eth_getProof","params":["0x7F0d15C7FAae65896648C8273B6d7E43f58Fa842", ["0x56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421"], "latest"], "id":1}' localhost:8545 | jq
```

Should return:
```
{
  "id": 1,
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": {
    "accountProof": [
      "0xf90211a...0701bc80",
      "0xf90211a...0d832380",
      "0xf90211a...5fb20c80",
      "0xf90211a...0675b80",
      "0xf90151a0...ca08080"
    ],
    "balance": "0x0",
    "codeHash": "0xc5d2460186f7233c927e7db2dcc703c0e500b653ca82273b7bfad8045d85a470",
    "nonce": "0x0",
    "storageHash": "0x56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421",
    "storageProof": [
      {
        "key": "0x56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421",
        "proof": [
          "0xf90211a...0701bc80",
          "0xf90211a...0d832380"
        ],
        "value": "0x1"
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
Source: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1186

#### Actual behaviour

```json
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": "1",
  "error": {
    "code": -32000,
    "message": "method handler crashed"
  }
}
```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

- Sync pruned node
- Make eth_getProof RPC request to `latest`

#### Backtrace

```
RPC method eth_getProof crashed: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[service.go:217 panic.go:884 panic.go:260 signal_unix.go:835 retain_list.go:132 eth_call.go:402 value.go:584 value.go:368 service.go:222 handler.go:494 handler.go:444 handler.go:392 handler.go:223 handler.go:316 asm_amd64.s:1594]
```
